Articles.Content:
Is the existence of borders in the game viable? If the multiplayer mode was made, could be generated countries to give each player a country (Kerbin fraction with its own Kerbal Space Center)? If each player have his own country would avoid problems like having two spaceships on the same platform and players could establish economic relations or scientific relations, making an economic trade or exchanging science.

I hope you consider this idea

Thanks
Why are different countries needed? Just multiple launch platforms at KSC

We won't know until we know what multiplayer will look like

But for what it's worth, KSC is on the equator. Most locations are not on the equator
